title: Compiler for C-Like Language
description: Fully-functional compiler for a C-like language. Built parser, scanner, AST, interpreter, and code generator.

title: Computer Vision: ROI Extraction
description: Deep learning model in PyTorch to segment road pixels from aerial images. 6226 images, 65%+ accuracy.

title: Wiki Search Engine
description: Efficient, scalable search engine in Python for Wikipedia documents (63+ GB). TF/IDF, semantic and link-based heuristics.

title: AI Bot for 4x4 Ultimate-Tic-Tac-Toe
description: AI agent in Python using alpha-beta pruning and heuristics. Qualified for intra-batch tournament semi-finals.

title: Bridging Video Content With Comments
description: Forked project to bridge video content with user comments for enhanced engagement and interactivity.

title: Python Multithreaded Web Server
description: Implemented a Python multithreaded server handling GET, POST, HTTPS requests, and DoS attack mitigation.

title: Bloxorz Opengl 3D Game
description: Basic implementation of the Bloxorz puzzle game in 3D using OpenGL.
